# EDGE2 Easy Report

EDGE2 Easy Report is a comprehensive web application for managing and generating geotechnical investigation reports.

## Pages

- [Easy Report](/): Login page for authenticated access to the application
- [New Report](/new-report): Create and generate new geotechnical investigation reports
- [Settings](/): Admin dashboard for managing users and application settings (Admin only)

## Features

- **User Authentication**: Secure login system with role-based access control (Admin/Standard users)
- **Report Generation**: Create detailed geotechnical investigation reports with automated formatting
- **User Management**: Admin users can add, activate, and deactivate application users
- **Role-Based Access**: Standard users can create reports; Admin users have full access to settings and user management

## Technology Stack

- React with Vite
- Supabase for backend database
- TailwindCSS for styling
- React Router for navigation
